extendedInfo.description: Going to attend any special occasion - (Wedding, Birthday Celebration, Get together, Party, Meeting or festival) & wanna be Eye-Catcher among people...Helloooo Siren, We are here for you to make your job done with "Decorate Hair with Flowers" - which includes 175+ style images on how to decorate hair using flowers as per any occasion (and also relevant to different hairstyle).App includes special collection for Bride, Prom & for Hippie as well.Take a look towards app...Features* Exclusive collection on Decorating hair with flowers.* Well designed interface with high resolution images.* You can set your favorite style image on your phone's wall with one touch.* You can save any style image in phone's gallery at instant. * No internet connectivity required.* Good for your phone & battery.So, blossom your beauty & enjoy the application.Your suggestions are much valuable for us so don't forget to provide feedback after using the application.
